name: Lion Heart
description:
Lion Heart balances your electrical energies. It also promotes courage and confidence. Use when exposed to emf's such as computers and cell phones.  Spray on the bottom of your feet to feel balanced physically, mentally and emotionally.

 Lion Heart Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Rosewood, *Blue Tansy,  *Frankincense, *Spruce  and Purified Crystal Water.   
                             
 *= Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade
2 fl. oz mister

name: Divine Guide
description:
Divine Guide promotes deep meditation and unlocks your intuition.  Allow these ancient oils to offer you insight.   Useful when you have a question that needs answered. 

Divine Guide Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Sandalwood, *Frankincense,  *Myrrh, *Blue Tansy, *Tangerine, *Rosewood, *Spruce, *Cedarwood  and Purified Crystal Water.                                

 *=Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade 
2 fl. oz mister

name: Nostalgia
description:
Nostalgia is a holiday scent at its best! Enjoy the aromas that remind you of joy and happiness throughout the year!  This blend also has antiviral and antibacterial properties.

Nostalgia Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Orange, *Cinnamon,  *Spruce, *Clove, *Cedarwood, *Fir  and Purified Crystal Water.     
                   
*=Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade
2 fl. oz mister

name: Purify
description:
Purify can be used on cuts and scrapes as an antiseptic. Diffuse purify to cleanse your home of odors and mildew. This blend also makes an excellent Bug Repellant!

 Purify Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Lemongrass, *Citronella, *Lavandin, *Myrtle, *Rosemary, *Melaleuca  and Purified Crystal Water.                                

*= Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade
2 fl. oz mister

name: Serenity
description:
Serenity lifts your spirits and promotes peace.  Use to reduce stress, depression and anxiety.  This blend is commonly used as a perfume alternative.  Spray onto your pillow at night to promote restful sleep.

Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Blue Tansy,*Tangerine,*Orange, *Patchouli, *Ylang Ylang and Purified Crystal Water.                                

 *=Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade
2 fl. oz mister

name: White Light
description:
White Light can be used when you wish to feel secure, strong, grounded and empowered. This blend is anti-bacterial and assists the respiratory system. This is also a wonderful perfume alternative.

 White Light Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Spruce, *Fir,  *Cedarwood, *Ylang Ylang, *Angelica  and Purified Crystal Water.                               

 *= Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade
2 fl. oz mister

name: Wellness
description:
Wellness is commonly called Thieves. Protect yourself from airborne bacteria and germs with this blend. These oils are anti-viral, antiseptic and anti-bacterial. Spray in the air or on hands. This is a great solution for hand sanitizer and a must have for children! May also be used as a throat spray.

 Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Clove, *Cinnamon,  *Lemon, *Eucalyptus, *Rosemary  and Purified  Crystal Water.                                  

*= Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade
2 fl. oz mister

name: Zachary
description:
Zachary was created to help those diagnosed with Autism Spectrum Disorder. While promoting balance this blend soothes the nervous system.  Useful in stressful situations.

 Zachary Ingredients: Essential oils of: *Melissa, *Helichrysum, *Cedarwood, *Orange, *Blue Tansy, *Angelica, *Neroli,  *Ylang Ylang, *Sandalwood, *German Chamomile, *Lavender,  *Frankincense  and Purified Crystal Water.                                    

*= Certified Organic and Therapeutic Grade
2 fl. oz mister

name: Sample Kit
description:
InJoy all 8 of our blends at a discounted price with free shipping!  Just in time for the holiday season!  
This is a $30.00 savings.
A total of 16 fl. oz
